A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
LIKED
*visually breathtaking in places.
*Kylo's complexity is compelling.
*no Jar Jar Binks.
DISLIKED
*far too derivative of ESB\, (and ROTJ\,) look up soft reboot.
*clich?d\, thinly-veiled social justice politics driving plot.
*unnecessarily iconoclastic towards originals.
*Luke\, now a poor old b*****d\, reduced to sucking the teet of an unnervingly seductive beast.
*Rey even more inexplicably powerful\, actually a disservice to female empowerment.
*Too much Marvel-esque humour\, was expecting that raccoon from Guardians Of The Galaxy to make a cameo.
